EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-02-15-Q1 Town Hall.EMAIL- Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Partner Town Hall Meeting-Register Today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, As a valued partner, we would like to invite you to join us on our upcoming Partner Town Hall Meeting. <[[https://turbonomic.com/q1-17-partner-town-hall-meeting/]]> This live webinar is taking place on Wednesday, February 15th at 11:00 AM EDT.
Join us in this opportunity to connect with partners and look at our top initiatives for Q1 as they pertain to the channel. We will be discussing the following:
- New $50M Investment
- Former GE CIO, Gary Reiner, Joining Our Board of Directors - Q & A
This webinar will be approximately 45 minutes and will have a 15 minute Q & A session to voice any questions, concerns, and feedback. Register here <[[https://turbonomic.com/q1-17-partner-town-hall-meeting/]]> to join us on February, 15th at 11:00 AM EDT. I look forward to seeing you on the call,
Sean Finnegan Vice President of Channel Sales
